original: Bolin, Olof Daniel, folkskollärare. Stenkyrka, f. 10/3/78 i Sproge s :n, Gotl. 1. G. 05 m. Elise Engström. Barn: Elsa, g. Calamnius. — Folksk:-lär:ex. 99. Lär. v. Stenkyrka sk. sed. 00, tillsyn :lär. där sed. 20. Tf. folk-sk :insp. i Gotl. insp :omr. somr. 26 o. 27. Ordf. i barnavind sed. 24, i komm:stämma sed. 38 o. i komm:-fullm. sed. 39, v. ordf. i pensrnd o. valnd, led. av kyrkoråd sed. 45, kro-noomb. v. tax., kyrko-, prästlöne-, skol- o. pastoratskassör sed. 25, lär kårens repr. i skolrådet sed. 06, ordf. i Sv:es allm. folksk :lär :fören. länsnd på Gotl. sed. 25, i Stenkyrka hem-bygdsfören. sed. 31, led. av styr. f. Gotl.-krets. av Sv:es allm. folksk :-lär:fören. sed. 23, riksantikv. omb. inom Stenkyrka-Tingstäde-Martebo-Lummelunda socknar sed. 28, led. av styr. f. Visby barn- o. upptagn :hem. GMmf 5 st. 45.
translated: Bolin, Olof Daniel, primary school teacher. Stenkyrka, born on March 10, 1878 in Sproge parish, Gotland. Married in 1905 to Elise Engström. Children: Elsa, married to Calamnius. Primary school teaching degree received in 1899. Started teaching at Stenkyrka school in 1900, promoted to supervising teacher in 1920. Acting inspector for Gotland's inspectoral district for two summers in 1926 and 1927. Chairman of the board for Barnavind since 1924, in the municipality assembly since 1938, in the municipal council since 1939, vice chairman of the pension and choice committee, member of the church council since 1945, tax official for the crown, treasurer for the church, clergy, school, and parish since 1925, representative for the teaching corps in the school council since 1906, chairman of the Swedish primary school teacher association's county committee on Gotland since 1925, chairman of the Stenkyrka local history association since 1931, member of the board for the Gotland district of the Swedish primary school teacher association since 1923, national antiquarian delegate within the Stenkyrka-Tingstäde-Martebo-Lummelunda parishes since 1928, member of the board for Visby children's home and intake center. Married to five children since 1945.
